Description:
Detects DNS server discovery via LDAP query requests from uncommon applications

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DNS Server Discovery Via LDAP Query
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (query_name like '_ldap.%' and  not (process_path = 'null' or (process_path like '%:\program files\%' or process_path like '%:\program files (x86)\%' or process_path like '%:\windows\%') or (process_path like '%:\programdata\microsoft\windows defender\platform\%' and process_path like '%\msmpeng.exe') or process_path = '<unknown process>') and  not (process_path like 'c:\windowsazure\guestagent%' or (process_path like '%\chrome.exe' or process_path like '%\firefox.exe' or process_path like '%\opera.exe')))
